title: nf-core/fastquorum pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_3.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 3 (e.g. index1/i7) cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_4.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 4 (e.g. index2/i5) cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

read_structure.errorMessage: Read structure must be provided; For format, see: https://github.com/fulcrumgenomics/fgbio/wiki/Read-Structures
